SummaryEnglish: Young Yuri finds herself on top of a skyscraper in a strange world, where she must survive the attacks of masked attackers who seek to kill their prey.

1.TitleEnglish: I Just Don't Get This World
1.SummaryEnglish: Transported to the top of a skyscraper, Yuri desperately tries to evade a masked killer, but her escape routes are few.

2.SummaryEnglish: Mayuko kills others without any hesitation, desperate to escape. An encounter with Yuri brings back her sense of humanity.

3.SummaryEnglish: Rika confirms that his sister Yuri is still alive when she calls him. Soon after, he faces the wrath of a masked baseball pitcher.

4.TitleEnglish: I Won't Give in to This World
4.SummaryEnglish: Sniper Mask looks to help a scared Kuon. Yuri and Mayuko head toward Rika, but the saw-wielding Chef Mask has other plans for them.

5.SummaryEnglish: Seeking revenge for his annihilated crew, Tanabe pleads for Yuri and Mayuko’s help taking down “God Candidate” Aohara and his masked killer, Ein.

6.TitleEnglish: If I Become a Perfect God
6.SummaryEnglish: Mayuko vows to keep fighting until Yuri reunites with her brother, but she realizes it may only be a matter of time before she loses her mind.

7.SummaryEnglish: Yuri acquires new powers. Rika and his allies reach Yoshida, but they face fierce opposition from Police Mask and her killer army.

8.TitleEnglish: I've Cast Off My Humanity, But That's Fine
8.SummaryEnglish: Mayuko and Yuri reunite on top of a skyscraper amidst a grenade attack. Now held hostage, Rika is summoned before a God Candidate.

9.TitleEnglish: Which Of Us Will Live a Cool Live?
9.SummaryEnglish: Aikawa deploys a sniper to Yuri’s location in a move to eliminate other God Candidates. It's a battle of equals as Sniper Mask takes on the threat.

10.TitleEnglish: Our Enemy is One Who Desires Chaos
10.SummaryEnglish: Aohara, Tanabe and the others approach Yuri to form an alliance. Mayuko and Kuon come to Sniper Mask's aid when he starts to lose his mind.

11.SummaryEnglish: With Yuri and her allies' location exposed, Aikawa dispatches an elite team led by Police Mask to purge those who disagree with his ideology.

12.SummaryEnglish: Archangel destroys everything in his path in the name of justice. Mayuko and the others stand in his way, but who will die, and who will prevail?
